channel.title: 3dprinting on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in 3dprinting on Joost Plattel

item.title: Jawsaver
item.description: Jawsaver engineers smart earbuds to stop teeth grinding & clenching. Bruxism is a problem and to solve that I was asked to create several prototypes of mechanics to see what’s the most interesting strategy to develop into a product. All prototypes where supported with a dynamic earbud platform that let’s a user test different mechanics. Arduino’s, micropython, 3D printing and rapid prototyping are things that we’re used in this development proces.

item.title: Front404
item.description: Bas van Oerle and Thomas voor ’t Hekke asked me to develop a series of crystals and 3D print them for immersive theater. I’ve designed a set of 16 crystals that can be filled with LEDs for interactivity.
